RealTimeDashboard.title: Real-Time Weather Dashboard
RealTimeDashboard.description_short: Built using Power BI & OpenWeather API, published on Microsoft Fabric. Tracks live temperature, humidity, and wind across cities to support smarter decisions in travel and logistics.

user_friendly_explanation.what_it_does: Shows the latest weather conditions like temperature, humidity, and wind speed in different cities.
user_friendly_explanation.why_useful: Helps professionals in travel, logistics, or events make fast, data-driven decisions.
user_friendly_explanation.how_it_works: Uses Power BI with Power Query to fetch live data from OpenWeather API and displays it with interactive visuals.
user_friendly_explanation.summary: This dashboard gives you real-time weather updates in one place—fast, reliable, and visual.
